name: Chain Gun (xtaxta)
description:
I wanted a chain gun game, so I made a simple chain gun game for the Playdate.


CONTROLS

* Crank to shoot. The faster you crank, the faster you shoot

* Press Left or Right to move your chain gun

If the invader reaches the bottom, it's Game Over

Note: You need a Playdate console (or simulator) to launch this app.
